text: Ārau tōmāra pūrbē'ō bahutō raāchulara ōparata mithyāraōpa karaā haichila, kintu tē'ōm̐lōkaka mithyāraōpa karaā ārau kaṣṭa diẏāra pichatō tē'ōm̐lōkē dhairya dhāraṇa karaichila, araśēṣata tē'ōm̐lōkara ōcarata āmāra sahāẏa āhichē. Ārau āllāhara bāṇīsamūhara kōnō paraibartanakāraī nā'i. Niścaẏa raāchulasakalara kichu sambāda tōmāra ōcaralaikē'ō āhichē
